Minister.Text: Minister of Employment and Social Development (2013, c. 40, s. 220) except in Parts IV and VII (2005, c. 34, s. 80); Minister of National Revenue (Parts IV and VII)

Section.Text: 2008, c. 28, s. 131 (Note: but s. 131 was repealed before coming into force); repealed, 2010, c. 12, s. 2188

General.Text: General, 2009, c. 30, ss. 3 to 7 (claimants not in Canada)

Transition provision, 2020, c. 5, s. 60 (re s 58 application provision)

Item.Text: — except as otherwise provided in this section, this Act in force on 30.06.96 see s. 190(1)
— the following provisions in force on 05.01.97:
(a) the definitions “major attachment claimant” and “minor attachment claimant” in s. 6(1);
— ss. 7.1(1) to (3) come into force on 05.01.97, but see also the application provision s. 190(3.1) re notices issued under s. 7.1(4);
— s. 19(3) comes into force on 05.01.97 but see also the application provision s. 190(3.2) re deductions under subpar. 19(3)(a)(i) (any failure to declare earnings);
— ss. 172 to 175 in force on 01.01.98 see s. 190(6);
— see also the application provisions ss. 190(4) and (5).
